metadata.synopsis: Played when the party approaches the Danthalon's Dancing Axe shop, if Jaheira has been recruited and mentioned that this is a secret Harpers’ meeting spot. If she's in the party she will remind about this place herself, otherwise the party refers to what she told the player before.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Up there. Danthelon's Dancing Axe - the Harper safe-house Jaheira mentioned.
